name: Jamal Zakhilwal
story: Hussein Zakhilwal was born and raised in a small village in Afghanistan. He joined the military as soon as he was allowed, eager to defend his country against all foreign invaders. After years of service, he became a marksman and was deployed to various hotspots around the world. Despite his successful career, Hussein is a lonely man who prefers to keep to himself. He has no family and has never been married, often spending his free time reading books on his favorite topics - history, politics, and philosophy.
